name: Windows Manage Certificate Authority Injection
author: vt <nick.freeman@security-assessment.com>
description:
This module allows the attacker to insert an arbitrary CA certificate
        into the victim's Trusted Root store.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: CAFILE
options.description: Path to the certificate you wish to install as a Trusted Root CA.
